11.content: Which girl will you choose?
11.title: Persona 3

111.content: You wake up to the sound of seductive giggles as you open your eyes. As you look around to take in your surroundings you realize that you’re not in your room let alone in your house. You also notice that the ground felt off, but why? As you look around you then realized that you were....
111.title: Yukari’s hidden lust

choices: Put you in her bra or cleavage
1111.content: You were on Yukari’s belly but before you can do anything you hear her voice. “My my, aren’t you a cute one, I might just keep you for myself, I was planning on sharing you with Mitsuru Senpai but I think you’re too cute to share.” Yukari said in a seductive tone. Yukari then grabs you with two fingers and brings you to her face and said in that same seductive tone as she did before, “now then cutie, what should I do with you first?”
1111.title: On Yukari’s Belly

choices: No, bag to be let out of her panties
11112.content: Yukari licks her lips at you as her lust was taking her over. She lowers you down to her crotch and lustfully says, “I can’t resist the urge to have such a tiny cutie like you inside of me, I want you deep inside of me little one, very deep!” With that Yukari opens the front of her panties and lets go of you which in turn makes you free fall towards the inside of her panties. I didn’t expect you to land on my clit sweetie, but since you’re there, mind pleasing it for me cutie?!” She says in that seductive tone again.
11112.title: Into Yukari’s Panties
